gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components
Class PseudoLogScaleUtil

java.lang.Object
  gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.PseudoLogScaleUtil

public class PseudoLogScaleUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This class logarithmically maps from a source interval [source_min,source_max] to a destination interval [dest_min,dest_max] using pseudo log scaling. Pseudo-log uses a log scale factor to adjust the amount of log mapping (used in colorscale) while tru-log maps using log with no variability, thus requiring no scale factor. Use LogScaleUtil for tru-log mapping.

Constructor Detail

PseudoLogScaleUtil

public PseudoLogScaleUtil(float source_min,
                          float source_max)
Constructor - specify an interval [source_min,source_max] that will be mapped logarithmically itself. All values for this interval must be positive. This constructor automatically sets the destination interval to the source interval. Use this constructor to logarithmically scale an interval while keeping the endpoints the same. If source interval is negative, it will be turned into a positive interval.

Parameters:
source_min - - The interval minimum, (min > 0)
source_max - - the interval maximum, (max > 0)

PseudoLogScaleUtil

public PseudoLogScaleUtil(float source_min,
                          float source_max,
                          float dest_min,
                          float dest_max)
Constructor - specify an interval [source_min,source_max] and interval [dest_min,dest_max] that will logarithmically map values between [source_min,source_max] to the interval [to_min,to_max].

Parameters:
source_min - - The min of the source interval getting mapped from.
source_max - - The max of the source interval getting mapped from.
dest_min - - The min of the destination interval getting mapped to.
dest_max - - The max of the destination interval getting mapped to.
Method Detail

toDest

public float toDest(float num,
                    double s)
This method is for "pseudo" log mapping from the source interval to the destination interval.

Parameters:
num - Source number on interval [source_min,source_max].
s - - logscale value
Returns:
Log(num) mapped to interval [dest_min,dest_max].

toSource

public float toSource(float num,
                      double s)
This method is for "pseudo" exponential mapping from the destination interval to the source interval.

Parameters:
num - Number on interval [dest_min, dest_max].
s - - logscale value
Returns:
Mapped value of num on interval [source_min, source_max].
